confetti.gt: I Recently got divorce too, it’s the hardest thing I have ever been through but I’m super grateful because trying to heal from that I found myself, I’m still like “under construction” but I know everything will be ok eventually, thanks for sharing and being such great inspiration for me and many girls out there 🙏🏻😊💜🔮✨
chrissykaszanek: Long time follower, first time commenter...Divorce is so hard and so heartbreaking. Things don’t always end up as we plan or hope, but that doesn’t necessarily mean a permanent personal failure. Nothing in life is permanent and we are always re-writing our stories. Thank you for all the constant laughs, inspiration , confidence, and levity you provide to me, and many others @jengotch
anneloveridge: Thank you... i’ve been divorced for many years. The first time we hit, the mark, I’ve been divorced more years then we were married, stung a little bit. To this day, some 20 years being divorced, something will happen and I will miss him because he was my best friend. Thank you so much for writing what you did it was beautiful.
wildb_99: Really helped reading this. Mourning the past and fearing the future is hard. Regretting things you did (and didn’t) say. I’m glad you’re healing 👍🏻
soltouchhealing: You speak powerful words for self acceptance and I congratulate you! que.vie: Beautiful. Ty for being so transparent. Loss is hard ❤️❤️❤️
megwlove: Ugghhh yes. I dated my ex husband again 4 years after the divorce and he broke up with me via email 2.5 years after that!
